summary: A mix of Antique Dragon's texture handling and the 3D effect of Suki's ENB. Tweaked for Natural Lighting Vivid Atmospherics and ELFX interiors. (NO ENHANCER). Skies are tweaked to give an illustrated appearance.
descriptionHtml:
WHY I DID THIS?:
If you are as crazy as I am about modding Skyrim you already know ENBs are the quickest way to change how the game looks. Keeping things fresh. ENBs are like an artist's rendition of Skyrim. All up to personal taste. 
I wanted to have realism blended seamlessly into fantasy. So I mixed two enbs together. Antique Dragon's insane texture handling with Suki's amazing 3D effect. The sky and environment were also tweaked to get a magic infused High-Fantasy vibe. Just breathtaking beauty all the time.

WHAT YOU NEED:
1. Enhanced Lighting and FX (ELFX). NO ENHANCER. Install only interiors. ENHANCER is exterior. Weathers handle exteriors instead. Waaay better that way.
2. Vivid Weathers
3. Natural Lighting Vivid Atmospherics (NLVA) 
4. The latest ENB binary host from Boris. -A given install off His website
5. An ENBoost- a given (watch a youtube video) Stops CTDs
6. A memory patch - the best is Skyrim Stability Guide found here on the Nexus, which covers ALL the technical bases and has the famous mod author Sheson's name on it.  Stops CTDs
 
INSTALLATION:
1. Install latest enb binary from Boris's website
2. Install ENBoost (follow a youtube video)
3. dl a memory patch from the nexus
4. Install latest version of Vivid Weathers
5. Install Natural Lighting Vivid Atmospherics (NLVA)
6. uncheck/disable Vivid Weathers esp in NMM or Mod manager. This allows NLVA to work as an upgrade to vivid weathers. 

Download this file manually and
extract using 7zip or winrar straight to the skyrim folder 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

My Rig:  (for your reference)

I build my rig in 2017 beginning of this year. Great intel RAM, processor whatnot and a GeForce 1070 graphics card. So my frames do well. This ENB is for high-end rigs. However.... 

FOR BETTER PERFORMANCE: press SHIFT+ENTER while in game to bring up the ENB menu and under "Effect" (left hand column) Turn off ambient occlusion. Also turn off Depth of Field.
    
(optional)
Give my enblocal file a try. Drop in the Skyrim folder. (NOT Skyrim data folder of course.) This enblocal file is for reference. My memory allocation is based on my system specs. So always back up your previous enblocal file to desktop. Try inputing your memory size amount instead of mine if problem occurs.
Otherwise my enblocal file is tweaked for high fps and use with a memory patch. 


TL;DR:

I like the game Dark Souls and the whole series. This ENB makes your game look beautiful and high fantasy at all times. 
This ENB works only with ELFX interiors (No enhancer) and Natural Lighting Vivid Atmospherics

If you are lazy like me. This ENB could work with other weather systems and lighting mods, just tweak brightness/adaptation section using the SHIFT+ENTER  ENB in-game menu on the right side column. 

Best of Luck

Enjoy!

RECOMMENDED MODS TO LOOK LIKE SCREENS:
All screen were taken in game, no edits, with ambient occulusion on and DoF off. Performance was smooth at 80fps average using my Enblocal file specs.
(mostly having Borderless window set true helps in Enblocal)

Search on the site:

HDsnowflake for vivid weathers. ---- Works with NLVA on the less stormy snow.
Vivid Landscapes
HD embers
HD Fire
Electricity retex- forgot name search for a retex of all spells
SMIM
Wearable Lanterns 
Glassfix for wearable lanterns
DynDoLOD- sooooooooooooo worth it
Real Water TWO - that water mod everyone recommends
vivid weathers and then overwrite with NLVA, uncheck VW esp---for amazing cloud formations
aMidianBookofSilence-for the BEST retex of monsters and all armor to look the best.
BookofUUNP- vanilla armor variation
Amazing World of Bikini Armor --NiseTaka and gamefever
Valhalla Skin- realistic skin and UV maps
Mobius Belmont's Solsthiem Landscape overhaul
Noble Skyrim

Retex the crap of out Skyrim if you can. Adds a layer of polish, worth it.
author: Leadpipejustice
